definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
leaving a rich aftertaste/(fig.) memorable/lingering in memory
it will cause no end of trouble (idiom)
extraordinary strength/super strong/strong as an ox
to have disastrous consequences/also written 貽害無窮|贻害无穷[yi2 hai4 wu2 qiong2]
if you beat the snake without killing it, endless evils will ensue (idiom)
pinyin: da3 she2 bu4 si3 , hou4 huan4 wu2 qiong2

sentences.english: Thee ends of the earth have made, only Shien infinite period.
sentences.chinese: 天涯海角有盡處，只有師恩無窮期。

sentences.english: Lydgate found it more and more agreeable to be with her.
sentences.chinese: 利德蓋特越來越覺得，跟她在一起趣味無窮。

sentences.english: With flavor and aroma of baking, after drinking halls.
sentences.chinese: 帶焙火的韻味與香氣，飲後令人回味無窮。

sentences.english: They're a very beautiful animal. Everything about them is just interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他們的外表十分美麗，有關狼獾的一切都奧妙無窮。

sentences.english: Or, if a matrix is not invertible, then you have infinitely many solutions.
sentences.chinese: 或者矩陣不可逆時，有無窮解。

sentences.english: So the number of types of aioli is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 因此蒜泥蛋黃醬的種類將是無窮無盡的。

sentences.english: For that, we also need to check the boundary points, or look at the behavior of a function, at infinity.
sentences.chinese: 還得比較邊界點，或判斷函數在無窮遠處值。

sentences.english: The local dishes are robust and challenging, featuring mainly pork.
sentences.chinese: 地方菜口味濃重，令人回味無窮，以豬肉主料爲特色。

sentences.english: I have also marveled at XMUP's creativity.
sentences.chinese: 廈大出版社無窮的創造力也令我驚歎。

sentences.english: I declare that the Library is endless.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，這座圖書館是無窮無盡的。

sentences.english: The possibilities are practically endless if you really think hard about it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你仔細認真的想的話你會發現可能性是無窮的。

sentences.english: Welcome to this scenic place, where you'll find an endless enjoyment for your holiday.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎光臨風韻之境，給您的假日增添無窮樂趣。

sentences.english: Test-driving different brands with your partner can be fun.
sentences.chinese: 和朋友一路施用不同品牌的體驗過程樂趣無窮。

sentences.english: The ends of the earth have made, only Shien infinite period.
sentences.chinese: 天涯海角有盡處，只有師恩無窮期。

sentences.english: This antediluvian shows boundless glamour in change modelling respect.
sentences.chinese: 這個老古董在改變造型方面顯示出無窮魅力。

sentences.english: We think Astro Soichi would have made a great roommate.
sentences.chinese: 我們覺得屋子裏有宇航員野口聰一作伴一定其樂無窮。

definition: to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
